title: What are some inventions that should have been more popular but were hindered by the inventor and the things he did? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several, but the most shocking invention to you might be that attributed to the Wright brothers. After their European demonstrations, Wilbur Wright gave up all aeronautical work and focused exclusively on litigation, suing everyone left and right for perceived violation of his patents. His notorious methods severely hindered the progress of aviation, because an airplane is not a fax machine. It needed improvements in several areas, but every one of them was blocked by the Wrights’ lawyers. Glenn Curtiss, one compatriot, was one of those who suffered, and it is recorded that he was blamed by the Wright family for Wilbur’s death by typhoid.

This question is so top secret that it probably can’t be proven. Vimanas or flying saucers that existed 5,000 years ago in India were primarily used to travel to other planets and beyond. The ships were easy to operate and used artificially intelligent navigation systems. It also overcame the time/space continuum, aerodynamics, and other amenities needed for space travel. Don’t be surprised if one day Earthlings wake up to billions of Vimanas from all over this Universe surrounding this tiny insignificant planet.
